scripts.buildSetupWalletApp: rm -rf static/apps/setupWallet && parcel build --dist-dir static/apps/setupWallet/ apps/setupWallet/src/index.html && sed -i 's/ src="\// src=".\//g' static/apps/setupWallet/index.html
scripts.buildAbiReactApp: rm -rf static/apps/abiContract && parcel build --dist-dir static/apps/abiContract/ apps/abiContractApp/src/index.html && sed -i 's/ src="\// src=".\//g' static/apps/abiContract/index.html
scripts.buildWalletReactApp: rm -rf static/apps/reactWallet && parcel build --dist-dir static/apps/reactWallet/ apps/reactWallet/src/index.html && sed -i 's/ src="\// src=".\//g' static/apps/reactWallet/index.html
scripts.buildExampleReactApp: rm -rf static/apps/reactApp && parcel build --dist-dir static/apps/reactApp apps/reactApp/index.html && npm run reactAppIndexAppFix
scripts.buildRunTmp: npx tsc src/testing.ts && sed -i 's/bip39_light_1\.default/bip39_light_1/g' src/testing.js && node src/testing.js
scripts._compile: tsc && cp src/*renderer.js dist/ && sed -i 's/\.default//g' dist/main.js
scripts.start: npm run buildWalletApp && npm run build && electron ./dist/main.js
scripts.buildWalletApp: rm -rf static/apps/Wallet && parcel build --dist-dir static/apps/Wallet/ apps/wallet/src/index.html && sed -i 's/ src="\// src=".\//g' static/apps/Wallet/index.html
